description: Hyundai has put three engines on offer: a 1.5-litre naturally aspirated petrol (making 115PS and 144Nm), a 1.5-litre diesel (115PS and 250Nm) and a 1.4-litre turbo-petrol (140PS and 242Nm). The 1.5-litre petrol and diesel engines are coupled to a six-speed manual transmission and optionally, the former comes with a CVT gearbox and the latter is coupled to a torque converter.

Hyundai i20 is a 5 seater Hatchback available in a price range of Rs. 5.99 - 9.99 Lakh. It is available in 10 variants, a 1197 cc, BS6 and 2 transmission options: Manual and Automatic. Other key specifications of the i20 include a kerb weight of, ground clearance of and boot space of 295 litres. The i20 is available in 7 colours.

BMW 3 Series is a 5 seater Sedan available in a price range of Rs. 40.90 - 60.90 Lakh. It is available in 10 variants, a 1998 cc, BS6 and 2 transmission options: Automatic and Manual. Other key specifications of the 3 Series include a kerb weight of, ground clearance of and boot space of 480 litres. The 3 Series is available in 8 colours.

Other key specifications of the 5 Series include a kerb weight of, ground clearance of and boot space of 480 litres. The 5 Series is available in 8 colours.
